sect1.title: Installing an &Admin_Node; using &ay;
sect1.para: To assist with automating the installation of &productname; clusters as much as possible, it is possible to automatically install the &admin_node; with &ay;, similarly to the process used for &worker_node;s.
Be aware, though, that this requires considerable customisation of the autoyast.xml file.
Here is a sample file to create an &admin_node;.

Copy the above and paste it into a file named autoyast.xml, then edit it as appropriate for your configuration. After you have prepared the file, you will need to put it on a Web server that is accessible to the &productname; cluster.
After this, install the admin node by following the same procedure as for a &worker_node; in .
